title.rendered: LAWS Once Again Recognized as a Leading Access to Justice Organization

content.rendered:
LAWS has once again been recognized as one of Ontario’s leading access to justice organizations by The Law Foundation of Ontario. The Foundation selected 25 nonprofit organizations to participate in the second cycle of Catalyst, its highly competitive core funding program.

LAWS is incredibly grateful for the generous support it has received from The Law Foundation since its inception.

Read the full story here.
